titleStmt.title: A proclamation for reuocation of mariners from forreine seruices.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie.,

notesStmt.note: Dates are given according to Lady Day dating.
At end of text: Thetford the first day of March, in the second yeere of our raigne ... .
Precautions against piracy and to prevent hostilities between Dutch and Spanish ships. Cf. STC.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
